title: Implement Agent Signal Publisher
description: Update all WAVE agents (CTO, PM, FE-Dev, BE-Dev, QA, Dev-Fix) to publish signals via Redis instead of writing to files or polling. Each agent publishes standardized signals for gate completion, errors, and status updates.

objective.i_want: to publish completion and status signals via Redis
objective.so_that: the orchestrator receives my updates in real-time (<100ms)

acceptance_criteria.description: All agents have signal publisher injected
acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN agent initialized THEN it has access to SignalPublisher instance
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Initialize each agent type, verify publisher exists

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN agent completes gate THEN gate_complete signal published with gate_id and result
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Complete gate in test agent, verify signal in Redis stream

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN agent encounters error THEN agent_error signal published with error details
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Trigger error in agent, verify error signal published

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN agent working on long task THEN progress signal published every 30 seconds
WHEN signal published THEN it includes agent_id, session_id, timestamp, story_id
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Capture signal, validate all required fields present

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN Redis unavailable THEN agent logs warning and continues execution
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Disconnect Redis, verify agent continues without crash

reuse_patterns.mixin_pattern: SignalPublisher as mixin for all agents

test_categories.name: Agent Integration
examples: All agents should use same signal format

mocking_strategy.redis: Mock publisher for unit tests, real Redis for integration

stop_conditions: Agent crash due to publisher error
safety.rollback_plan: Disable publisher mixin, agents continue without signals

notes: Use mixin pattern to add signal publishing to all agents without duplicating code. Ensure publishing is non-blocking.
implementation_notes: 🟡 IN PROGRESS (40%): Publisher exists in orchestrator/src/pubsub/publisher.py. Needs: agent-to-orchestrator signal publishing, verify agents can publish to Redis, integration testing. Files: orchestrator/src/pubsub/publisher.py
